snippet: The range of performers at Terminal 5 on the first anniversary of his death testified to how wide Yams’s umbrella truly was.
abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook praises Yams Day tribute concert for showcasing values extolled by ASAP Yams, hip hop record executive who died in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The range of performers at Terminal 5 on the first anniversary of his death testified to how wide Yams’s umbrella truly was.

headline.main: ASAP Yams, Honored as an Imbiber and Arbiter of Hip-Hop
headline.print_headline: Honoring an Imbiber and Arbiter of Hip-Hop
